mdRecord.dcterms:description: South elevation, showing Tree of Life stone relief

Mackintosh and Macdonald entered a competition to design a house a for an art lover in 1901; construction on the house 1989-1990 by Graham Roxburgh and the Glasgow School of Art based upon the competition drawings. -- https://www.houseforanartlover.co.uk/about/history-of-the-house [work]
